name: City Crime Gangster
description:
Download City Crime Gangster game now to move around like the god father of this adventurous mafia simulator. You have been given the mission in the crime city of Miami where you have the freedom to do some extra ordinary rule breaking mafia criminal robbery. Complete your missions strategically. Rescue your team mates as well from other Miami mafia gang. Enjoy this full thrilling game with many challenging missions to complete.


FEATURES:
- Open world environment
- Thrilling game missions
- Realistic HD graphics
- Different characters to select
- Time based missions and tasks
- Map direction to navigate into Miami city
